duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent in-store experiences and sales support within retail stores.
Educate visitors on the portfolio of Peloton products and content, creating meaningful interactions, customized solutions, and closing sales.
Stay current with new products, features, and content.
Contribute to all store activities, including inventory management, merchandising, marketing, and other duties as assigned.
Engage in cross departmental initiatives that may include Commercial, Third Party Retail, Corporate Wellness, community events, and Member Support.
